issue.title: [FCD] Ballot Comment GB-96

discussion.p: The function templates 'hash', 'less' and 'equal_to' are important customization points for user-defined types to be supported by several standard containers. These are accessed through the <functional> header which has grown significantly larger in C++0x, exposing many more facilities than a user is likely to need through there own header, simply to declare the necessary specialization. There should be a smaller header available for users to make the necessary customization.

issue.resolution: Provide a tiny forwarding header for important functor types in the <functional> header that a user may want to specialize. This should contain the template declaration for 'equal_to', 'hash' and 'less'.
